content.text: 将字符串的第一个字母转换为小写，其余部分保持不变。Converts the first letter of a string to lowercase while keeping the rest unchanged
首字母小写的字符串。String with first letter in lowercase
当paramString不是字符串时。When paramString is not a string

```ts
// Basic usage
decapitalize('Hello'); // -> 'hello'
decapitalize('World'); // -> 'world'
decapitalize('Hello World'); // -> 'hello World'
```

```ts
// Special characters and numbers
decapitalize('123ABC'); // -> '123ABC' (first character is not a letter)
decapitalize('!Hello'); // -> '!Hello' (first character is not a letter)
```

summary.text: 要取消大写的字符串（使用解构获取第一个字符）。String to decapitalize (uses destructuring for first character)

text.comment: 要取消大写的字符串（使用解构获取第一个字符）。String to decapitalize (uses destructuring for first character)

Function:

decapitalize

Description:

将字符串的第一个字母转换为小写，其余部分保持不变。Converts the first letter of a string to lowercase while keeping the rest unchanged

Returns:

首字母小写的字符串。String with first letter in lowercase

Throws:

当paramString不是字符串时。When paramString is not a string

Example:
// Basic usage
decapitalize('Hello'); // -> 'hello'
decapitalize('World'); // -> 'world'
decapitalize('Hello World'); // -> 'hello World'
Example:
// Already lowercase
decapitalize('hello'); // -> 'hello'
decapitalize('hELLO'); // -> 'hELLO'
Example:
// Special characters and numbers
decapitalize('123ABC'); // -> '123ABC' (first character is not a letter)
decapitalize('!Hello'); // -> '!Hello' (first character is not a letter)
Example:
// Edge cases
decapitalize(''); // -> ''
decapitalize('A'); // -> 'a'
